title: A Phule and His Money
description: Captain Willard Phule has whipped his troops into shape. That's how he turned Phule's Company from the laughingstock of the Legion into... a crack team of casino security guards.Now his company is deployed to help an underdeveloped planet. And what better way to utilize their major area of expertise – goofing off – than to turn it into the biggest intergalactic playground ever?
author: Robert Lynn Asprin
